page.title: 14ASHPERTON PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The Parish Council is made up of seven elected people of the village. It is one of the single village councils. Many are now made up of representatives from a group of small parishes.Its function is: 1)to be the liason between the village and other authorities e.g. as in traffic and planning . 2) to appoint representatives to village bodies e.g. the hall and school governors. 3) to levy 1p rate to pay village expenses e.g parish election, restoration of monument, contribution to flashing lights at school and upkeep of village green and church yard. It reports to the village every year at the parish meeting and presents accounts. It receives a statement of accounts from the charity trustees and oversees administration of the village charities.
